alert.note: Alert for Renville; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 9:11PM CST until December 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Renville and Ward counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST Sunday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of mixed precipitation may produce a light glaze of ice accumulation for some areas Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing.
